mapper.insert: insert into sales (sales_price, sales_createAT, sales_state, sales_time, service_id, cust_id) values (#{sales_price}, now(), 1, #{sales_time}, #{service_id}, #{cust_id})
mapper.select: select sales.id, sales_price, date_format(sales_createAT, '%Y-%m-%d') as sales_createAT, sales_state, date_format(sales_time, '%Y-%m-%dT%h:%i') as sales_time, service.service_nm as service_nm, cust.cust_nm as cust_nm, service.id as service_id, cust.id as cust_id from sales, cust, service where service_id = service.id and cust.id = cust_id and sales_state = 1
